msbt.message: The message you sent me? There was nothing on it. I was SUPER worried. I thought maybe someone stole the letters off your card? But that's not a thing that can happen, is it? Don't freak me out!
Um, so I got your blank message. I thought it was weird...but then I was like, I guess you don't need words to tell someone you care? So, here's how much I care: "_________"!
I got your blank message card. This was my favorite part: "_______________"! Deep. Makes you think, you know?
